name: Angry Bird
greetingText: onguda sangunoo :) for my feisty Valentine ‚ù§Ô∏è
text1: even though we sometimes ruffle few feathers!!! :D
textInChatBox: I Miss you miss you miss !! YOUUUUUU!..
text2: I know I don't send enough love daily.
text3: But Remember you're always held close within my heart
text4: Wherever I Roam, my heart sings, only for
text5Entry: I may not be with you always, but
text5Content: You are never out of my heart
wishText: You are and always will be MINE ‚ù§Ô∏è! ;)
outroText: ü§© there is no world like the one lit by your daaaaaamn smile.
